title: Train Sim
description:
With over 24M downloads, Train Sim is the realistic train game suitable for both adults and kids who enjoy trains. Control your more than 50 historical and modern trains which are perfectly recreated in 3D for your mobile device.

Train Sim‚Äôs Features:

‚óè	Awesomely Realistic 3D graphics
‚óè	50+ Realistic 3D Train Types
‚óè	40+ Train Car Types
‚óè	11 Realistic 3D Environments
‚óè	1 Underground Subway Scene
‚óè	Build Custom Environments
‚óè	3D Cab Interiors for all Trains
‚óè	Train derailments
‚óè	Kid-friendly
‚óè	Realistic Train Sounds 
‚óè	Easy Controls
‚óè	Regular Content Updates
‚óè	Optimized for Intel x86 mobile devices

What You Can Do

Whether looking to experience driving a train or just want to enjoy your favorite train setup in your preferred environment, this app is perfect for every train lover. With Train Sim you can:

‚óè	Drive the drains
‚óè	Pick up passengers from stations
‚óè	Carry freight 
‚óè	Sit in passenger cars
‚óè	Observe the train from the ground

Choose a Terrain!

This train driving simulator includes terrains that are geographically realistic 3D environments which provide a different experience every time you play. Here are the current options you can choose from:

‚óè	Southern England
‚óè	Mountain Pass
‚óè	American Midwest
‚óè	India
‚óè	Subway
‚óè	Port of Call
‚óè	Metropolis
‚óè	Airport
‚óè	Desert
‚óè	Kids Scene
‚óè	Japan
‚óè	California Coast
‚óè	Custom

As you see, there is an option to build your own, customized 3D terrain.

Choose a Train

Each environment suggests a train type that is appropriate for the terrain‚Äôs specifics. However, you can choose the one you like most. You can also change the train and its carriage cars while you are playing. Another great option is that you can decouple. You can also drop the freight cars while moving. 

Control the Weather

When you get bored of the nice weather, you can try driving trains while it‚Äôs raining or snowing. You can also choose a night option, and the lights will automatically turn on. Of course, you can manually switch the lights on and off whenever you feel like it. 

Achievement Points

You can see the list of the achievements that need to be unlocked and how many points they bring you. These can be declining a single train, crashing more than 10 passengers, trying out all the weather variations on a single scene, etc. Keep track of your progress and make the most of this train simulator game!

Whether you are looking for a train game for kids or for yourself, Train Sim is definitely something you should try out.

comments: As far as free mobile train Sims/apps go, this is probably one of the best I've come across thus far. It has a decent core of recognizable engines, with large maps that take several min. to loop around - complete with station and junction stops along the line. The rolling stock can be uncoupled and shunted, passengers can be let off at stations, controls are easy to follow, and while it has some limitations (namely but understandably graphics and r-stock variety,) it's overall a solid Sim/game.

title: Train and rail yard simulator
description:
Train and rail yard simulator lets you step into the shoes of a train engineer. Climb into a cab of a powerful locomotive and deliver freight cars to different yards around the map. 

Split and build your trains by coupling and decoupling rail cars and engines. Operate railroad switches to navigate your trains around yards and through junctions.

Features: Different maps and game modes, including missions and free roam mode, corking railroad switches, coupling and decoupling of rail cars and locomotives.
descriptionHTML:

Features: Different maps and game modes, including missions and free roam mode, corking railroad switches, coupling and decoupling of rail cars and locomotives.
summary: Train and rail yard simulator lets you step into the shoes of a train engineer
recentChanges:
- Different engines available for route game mode levels
- Some bug fixes and optimization
comments: I love this simulator!! This is the closest thing to reality as you can get without hiring on to the railroad. I'm more into the freight delivery part than everything else. Wish this could be more elaborate. The sandboxes need much more work. What's the point of the number system for train building when you end up getting very little to play with on such a giant map full of dead ends? I'm impressed with the realism.The only thing I hate is the power consumption, even on low graffics. Good job

The game after current update game is nice but while we start driving and leave the station there is only one track on which our train running I want 4-5 track after leaving the station and on it every after 2min train run on other track which is empty and in passenger loop there is no passenger there should be people on station and near building please make it happened than only I will 5 stars to this game and yes this game is very very nice thanks for reading I will wait for new update.

Overall great game however there are some minor glitches I am sure they plan on fixing, most of them wouldn't even lose a star over, however there are a few more annoying ones such as when you select spawn reversed it spawns sideways and off the tracks, random derailments at one of the switches on the train builder map(although this could just be me screwing up somehow) extreme difficulty getting up hill for some engines(although this might be intended to make it more realistic)
Fun game but the the controls are hard and so small go use. The graphics can be a lot better. The controls can be a lot better and little different. Other then that this game is fun...

You can get more credits to spawn trains, just watch an ad for 20 points and you can have super long trains to play with after a few ads. Love the different loco paint jobs available now too. Easy infograpghic cards explain what to do for the scenarios, but It isn't clear that ALL sandbox levels have a train builder! Can't wait to see more functionality added in the future, would be good to see more complex freight delivery /switching missions.

title: Train Station 2: Rail Tycoon & Strategy Simulator
description:
All the railway lovers, train collectors and train simulation enthusiasts who love everything rail transport related unite! It‚Äôs time to put your trains on rails and build a global railway empire. Become a railway tycoon and enjoy a beautiful train simulation journey full of surprises, achievements and challenging contracts.

Discover and collect hundreds of famous real-life trains. It can become quite challenging sometimes, but as a railway tycoon looking to build the biggest railway empire in the world you‚Äôll find a way. Develop your station and produce various products as some contractors may ask for something more than just raw materials.

Upgrading trains comes in handy because an upgraded train fleet is way more powerful when completing contracts and can save a lot of time! Did you know that there are train rarity categories? The rarer the train the higher the hauling capacity, just keep that in mind. Bending rules has never been easier either. 

TrainStation 2 Features:
‚ñ∂ Own the most popular trains from history of rail transport
‚ñ∂ Collect famous trains, upgrade them and reach their full potential
‚ñ∂ Meet interesting contractors and complete rail logistics jobs
‚ñ∂ Coordinate and dispatch your trains according to your own strategy
‚ñ∂ Enhance your railway station and build bigger and better rail facilities
‚ñ∂ Explore new global regions as your trains travel through them
‚ñ∂ Play new events every month in the TrainStation 2 world
‚ñ∂ Team up with fellow train enthusiasts during events & work together
‚ñ∂ Compete in leaderboards to become the biggest railway tycoon
‚ñ∂ Dispatch trains to collect resources and deliver those to your contractors to complete jobs

So are you up for a challenge to collect the most trains, to build and manage a global trains empire and become the biggest railway tycoon in the TrainStation 2 world?

Have you encountered a contract which does not suit you at the moment? Say no more! You can easily swap the contract requirements to get a better fit.

PLEASE NOTE! TrainStation 2 is an online free simulation game to download and play that requires a network connection to play. Some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. if you don't want to use this feature please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Do you have any suggestions or problems in your train station? Our caring community managers would love to hear from you, visit https://care.pxfd.co/trainstation2!

Terms of Use: http://pxfd.co/eula
Privacy Policy: http://pxfd.co/privacy

Do you enjoy our tycoon simulation game? Follow @TrainStation2 on social media to get the latest news and updates.

comments: Can be fun. I was hoping opening a new region would not use the same dispatchers. Since everything takes so long to complete. Every region should have a new set of dispatchers. It takes so long to complete things now, and level, and opening new regions you have to levels of 100s. Time rate should drop if levels are so high. And separate dispatchers for new regions. Then this game would be playable.

Whole lot of ho-humm. There are 100's of games with the same 'strategy', that is you need x units of item1 + y units of item2 to make item3, and so on... However, in this game you have a predefined layout (track, sources, destinations are already set) and predefined goals to advance. Sorta (and only sorta) interesting at the beginning but as you advance it quickly wears thin. There are lots of better games out there. By-the-way, the images in the advert are not representative of the game.

I was initially impressed with the game and the game play. If I would have known how often the game crashes I would have deleted it before I began. Please use the $20 I spent on your game to stop the crashing. Maybe one day when the game stops closing every 30 seconds it can be a 5star game. You've made it feel like a living, breathing town to your disadvantage. Kind of hard to enjoy the realism of 50 NPC cars driving on the roads when all that "busy-ness" is what causes the game to crash.

Train station 1, is a legend. I was hoping for the same with updated visuals. At first i was pleased with graphics and then i realized that gameplay is utter garbage. Huge downgrade. I was telling myself, its only because its newer game, but then i realized how broken and greedy system of getting new trains and upgrades of trains is. How is it even possible for company behind such a successful game as original Train Station put out something like this is beyond my understanding.

starts out strong, but the flaws become obvious in the second region - that's where the game gets tedious (especially when there are events). feedback (via support system or forums) is ignored. a very few balancing changes would dramatically improve this game: set up a shop to buy specific engines (once you've passed into a new region is practically impossible to get engines for the previous), and tone down the upgrade requirements (engines in the third area require exponential upgrade parts compared to the second, for example). another complaint is the ads. you can safely ignore the ads, there are none in-your-face, but the ad provider they've chosen for everything else is complete garbage. it's a gorgeous game, and a fun time pass, but the developers just aren't doing enough.

title: Train Conductor World
description:
Master and manage the chaos of international railway traffic as the ultimate railroad tycoon. Build the rail network of your dreams; lay rails to solve the railroad puzzle with branching and forking roads at every turn. Pick your path and become the richest rail manager!

Get in the driver's seat and take passengers to their destinations, dropping them at stations, and haul goods to ports and factories. Control and conduct the trains, marshalling them through tunnels, around obstacles and over mountains in this thrilling, fast-paced action arcade videogame. Connect your express trains across the railyard at breakneck speed. Try to avoid crashing, but I bet you can't. You'll need snappy strategy to master the chaos! Be on high-alert for explosive crashes, near-misses and split-second situations.

Ring the bell and toot your horn while playing in all types of weather, including rain, overcast, fog, thunderstorms and lightning. Find bullet trains, diesel trains, modern electric trains and trams. Customise your trains and pick your favourite train carriage style.

It all counts when you're growing the biggest railway in the world.

Let the locomotives loose!

comments: I'll be honest with you... The only reason I keep getting back to this game is because of my ports which are full of gold, because I need that gold for getting tiles, because I need those tiles to create an almost fully customizable rail network across Europe, for which I feel the need of rebuilding it from scratch more and more, as I continue playing it. It's addictive.. extra for rail enthusiasts, like me, extra for those with a bit of ocd /with a passion for keeping things neat and tidy.

This game is cool but it's very very very very hard to expand. I need iron tracks and all it ever gives me is wood. Come on man, don't make it so difficult. Because basically you can't expand unless you play for a hella long time, collect all the wood tracks you get, turn around and take 5 wooden tracks and turn it into ONE iron track or if you purchase tracks at a really high price WHICH I'VE ALREADY DONE TWICE. It's just another money hungry app. This game is pointless

This app deserves five stars it's a super game with lots of possibilities however I have marked it with two stars because a couple of inapp purchases didn't register and I didn't get a refund nor a response when I contacted feedback or support. Gave me the feeling I didn't count and made me wonder if that had happened to any one else - ashame customer service should be better.

I have been playing the game now for a few months and while the game is fun and enjoyable eventually it becomes painfully annoying.. You will never get a left hand alloy turn so some of the stations will be impossible to connect to. The prices for the alloy tiles to buy is ridiculously priced. The developers have it finely tuned that the game becomes impossible without thrown some cash their way.

This game is nice and relaxing for you don't have to think to much and love how the game keeps the law of motion. The game would be a lot better though, if we could play this game offline! I don't have a choice to play either on or offline and I personally think thats wrong. I have no interest in watching an ad just to up the games money, so having the internet connection is pointless for someone like myself. If possible could you please change this so people can play this game offline?

title: Tiny Train
description:
Mini Train ‚Äì The great Mini Train is heading out for its maiden journey, but it seem the blocks that have formed parts of its track have been moved and switched around. Now it is up to you to run ahead of the great Mini Train and put these blocks right so our hero train can complete his journey.

Each level in this game will ask you to take some blocks and arrange them to allow the mini train to travel across them. Use the mouse to grab a block and move it wherever you want by dragging it across the screen. The arrow keys can help maintain some balance to your building blocks.

Drag the pieces into place so that the train can drive from left to right without getting damaged. When the pieces are in place, tap play to start the train.

Game developed by gametornado.

title: Tiny Rails
description:
All aboard for an adventure around the world!

Grow your Grandpa's modest single engine train company into a multi-car masterpiece in this immersive, world-spanning game from Tiny Titan Studios. Deliver passengers and cargo across the world, while upgrading and customizing your train cars to become the ultimate railroad tycoon!

Features:
‚Ä¢ 100s of train set combinations each with their own unique characteristics!
‚Ä¢ Travel across the world and explore beautiful locations and famous landmarks!
‚Ä¢ Outfit your train with food, entertainment or comfort cars to increase passenger happiness and keep business booming!
‚Ä¢ Your train runs in the background even when you‚Äôre not playing!
‚Ä¢ Packed with gorgeous retro pixel art and relaxing music!




PLEASE NOTE! Tiny Rails is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Tiny Rails.

Tiny Rails can be played offline, but please note that an active internet connection is required to update the train shop.


Support:

recentChanges: We've fixed the issue with progress being reset and requiring a manual data sync. We apologize for any inconvenience. If updating doesn't restore your progress, please contact us.
comments: Best train game on the planet. I've gotten hours of enjoyment out of playing this game. I've spent a little real money on this game on some of the limited edition care packages, but it's not required for game play at all. And in fact, you can earn all the coins and gems you need by watching ads. So upgrading cars and engines and cabooses can be done entirely through game play and watching ads. If you love trains, you gotta try Tiny Rails.

It sucks that this game is basically pay to progress. Yeah, one can wait for hours to get enough gems or a free roll to possibly get a train car that they already have to level up. If not, you gotta wait longer. If the story missions didn't require a certain level to progress, it would be a lot more entertaining but oh well.

It's a great game! I absolutely love the pixel-like graphics. I got to say this game is one of if not my absolute top favourite game, and I have a lot of games so that's kinda sayin' something. title: Brick Train Build Game For Kids & Preschoolers
description:
Labo Brick Train is an amazing  train building and driving app for children. It provides a virtual sandbox where children can freely build and play with brick trains.

In Labo Brick Train, children build unique trains by putting together pieces of colorful bricks like a puzzle. They can select from 60+ classical locomotives templates, which range from old steam train to powerful diesel locomotive to modern high-speed train. Optionally, they can create entirely new designs using various brick styles and train parts. Once a train has been built, the children can thus go on the railway and experience exciting adventures.

Features:
1. 2 design modes:  template mode and free mode.
2. 60+ classical locomotive templates in template mode.
3. various brick styles, locomotive parts with 10 colors.
4. classical train wheels,  and a large number of stickers.
5. 7+ amazing railways, built-in a variety of mini-games.
6. Share trains with other players and browse or download trains created by others online.

If your kids like Lego Train or Thomas trains, he will definitely like Labo Brick Train.

title: Train Station: Train Freight Transport Simulator
description:
Join hundreds of thousands train dispatchers, collect thousands of trains and learn real-life stories about them.

Manage your station, earn resources by managing transport of passengers and gain various materials with freight trains. Use them to build up your train station and to purchase more passenger and cargo trains! Become a railway magnate in this awesome train simulator, finish hundreds of achievements, ship cargo to contract partners to gain awesome rewards. Cooperate with your friends to become a railroad tycoon, or compete with them in leaderboards to show off the power of your train fleet.

Explore the largest collection of steam, diesel, electric, maglev and hyperloop trains from manufacturers all over the world, including Northern America, Germany, India, Australia and more.

TrainStation Features:
‚ñ∂ Enjoy regular weekly updates full of wonderful content
‚ñ∂ Discover new achievements, contract partners and trains in seasonal events
‚ñ∂ Find new friends among train enthusiasts from all over the world
‚ñ∂ Build your station to gain bonuses for your freight trains
‚ñ∂ Send passengers to various destinations and earn gold
‚ñ∂ Collect real life locomotives, learn about them through information about them in museum
‚ñ∂ Compete with people from all around the world, your country or friends in leaderboards
‚ñ∂ Challenge yourself in strategic planning
‚ñ∂ Explore the world of railway trade
‚ñ∂ Show your unique station to the world

Personalize your station with colorful railroad themes like Western, San Francisco, Orient, London, New York and many more. Engage in fascinating story based quests provided by numerous contract partners and earn experience points and awesome rewards in return.

Build hundreds of different buildings and decorations and create your dream station, let your friends admire it and visit their own stations for inspiration, Collect real-life trains and learn about them in your Museum. Enjoy many events throughout the year, including spring, Halloween and Christmas events, each containing unique achievements, seasonal contract partners and themed locomotives, buildings and decorations.

PLEASE NOTE! TrainStation is an online free simulation game to download and play that requires a network connection to play. Some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. if you don't want to use this feature please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. 

Do you have any suggestions or problems in your train station? Our caring community managers would love to hear from you, visit https://care.pxfd.co/trainstation!

Terms of Use: http://pxfd.co/eula
Privacy Policy: http://pxfd.co/privacy

Do you enjoy our train simulator game? Follow @TrainStation on social media to get the latest news and updates.

title: Train Maker - The coolest train game!
description:
Create your own trains by freely uniting the carriages of bullet trains and regular trains in any way you want!
The trains you create will travel through tunnels and railway crossings.
You can experience the bumpy experience with the vibration feature once your train gets going.
This is the perfect game app for anyone who loves trains.

Features of this app
*You are free to unite your own choice of "leading carriages," "middle carriages," and "tail carriages" of bullet trains and trains.
*You can choose from eight different stages that your train will travel through: "a mountain and a tunnel", "lots of railway crossings", "a big river and a railway bridge", "highway route","Japanese scenery","Jet coaster","Inbound and outbound" and "Pass through many".
*You can switch between camera views and watch your running train from your favorite angle.
*You can use the "UP" and "DOWN" buttons to change the speed of your train or stop it.


How to play
1. The game begins at the rail yard. First, tap the "Create" button to create your train.
2. After selecting your first train, tap the "+" button to select the next train.
3. You can tap the "-" button to remove carriages.
4. When you are done, tap the "Finish" button in the top right corner to return to the rail yard. The train you have created will be shown at the top.
5. Tap the "GO" button on the right and select your preferred stage in the stage selection screen.
6. On the play screen, you can adjust the speed of your train using the bottom left button, change the camera distance with the bottom right button, focus the camera on your choice of carriage using the top right button, and freely adjust the camera position by dragging the area outside of the train. Give it a go and find the coolest angle!
7. You can tap and hold to stop the camera. It is also exciting to wait for a passing train to come back.
8.Tap the arrow button on the upper left to return to the railroad yard from the play screen. You can then check how many "Track miles" you've earned for the distance you've traveled. 
9.100 Track Miles lets you play Train Roulette one time. You can link up the trains you win in Train Roulette to have more fun. 
10.Check your Train Collection to see the trains you've collected so far. (You can check your Train Collection from the Track Miles screen.) 
11. You can tap the "Organizing" button at the rail yard to change the order of trains or delete trains that you do not want.
12. From the Settings button on the title screen, you can also toggle settings such as music, sound effects, image quality, vocal effects, and vibration mode.

title: Train Go - Railway Simulator
description:
Select the desired rail and connect it. 
Just tap to lay rails.
Create a railway with elevated rails, forking rails, etc., as you want.


Create a railway for your favorite train or bullet train and exercise your imagination and creativity. 
Great fun to run a train on a railway you created, and a great sense of accomplishment!

Add train stations and tunnels to customize it. Then run trains on it! 

Instructions
Tap the screen to add the desired rail. 
Tap the arrow in the direction you want to lay the rail. Very easy to lay rails. 

Tap on a background part to add buildings and trees wherever you want. 

After building the railway, tap on the Put Train button and select a train!
You can add and delete trains and change the running direction. 

After you are done, tap the Start Train button to start running the train.

When the train approaches a fork, use the following Fork button to switch the train's direction.

Camera Mode
Press "+" to zoom in. 
Press "-" to zoom out.
Press the arrow to change the camera angle. 
Train tracking: Press ON to track a train.

After you are done, tap the Start Train button to start running the train.

When the train approaches a fork, use the following Fork button to switch the train's direction.

Camera Mode
Press "+" to zoom in.
Press "-" to zoom out.
Press the arrow to change the camera angle.
Train tracking: Press ON to track a train.
summary: Create a railway with elevated rails, forking rails, etc., as you want.
recentChanges:
- Optimized for the latest OS.
- Bug fixes.
comments: Wonderful experience, playing with virtual trains, virtual stations and navigating between them!

This is a lovely and elegant game with beautiful graphics! The developers truly respect the audience with the sparse adverts which do not interfere with the game. I'm very impressed. The game is so relaxing to play and you get a generous playing area on which to build your tracks and buildings. Ride in the cab or view all the trains from above. It's a model railway enthusiasts dream :) Thank you Train Go !

Not bad, good way to pass the time. However, I purchased the city station and the trains won't stop on one side for some of the stations. For others, it stops just fine. Seems like a glitch. Also, this station can't be elevated. The regular can be elevated after purchasing the elevated station but this one cannot.

I believe this game is potential since we don't have many "Building railway network" type game in Google Play. But sadly they don't make any change to this game in recent updates. I really hope they can grow this game with "bigger land", "passengers", "X track" ,"door open/close", and even "Tram".
Very good game but i want some new trains bring them in this game in update version

title: Baby Train 3D
description:
Baby Train 3D is a beautiful 3D game of trains. It is mainly designed for babies (3years+) and kids. However, it should great fun for all the family too (no age limit!).

Baby Train 3D includes a powerfull editor that allows you to customize the train wagons and the train tracks. You can also load 7 different examples directly from the main menu.
The game is really easy. The goal is having fun, nothing else!

You can choose train speed, switch the camera, play choo choo sound, and click the special tracks for some basic action. 

If you like wooden trains then we hope you will like this game!

Note: This is a 100% free basic version. If you like it then please consider buying the premium version for some extra fun. Baby Train 3D Premium is now available in the Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blackdtools.babytrain3dpremium

stupidest game ever played it lets you build one track and its done for you building tracks plus brio world is better

title: Pocket Trains
description: From the creators of Pocket Planes comes Pocket Trains! Manage and grow multiple railroads by hauling important cargo around the world. Collect parts to construct all the different train types from Steamers to Diesels, and complete daily events to unlock special trains beyond imagination! Stop reading and start constructing your railroad empire in Pocket Trains
descriptionHTML: From the creators of Pocket Planes comes Pocket Trains! Manage and grow multiple railroads by hauling important cargo around the world. Collect parts to construct all the different train types from Steamers to Diesels, and complete daily events to unlock special trains beyond imagination! summary: From the creators of Pocket Planes comes Pocket Trains!
developerAddress:
6030 Santo Rd
Ste I #753
San Diego, CA 92124
recentChanges: + Fixed bugged daily event
comments: Like many of these types of games, you need to have serious patience at first. But, once you have played consistently for a while, and learned the best ways to structure railroads and progress, the game really speeds up and gets fun. At level 19 I have more than 20 railroads spanning 3 continents, and in just a few hours of play can quickly save up hundreds of thousands of in game coins. If you decide to stick it out, make sure to check out the wiki and the subreddit for tips! 10/10 great game.

I like the game a lot, enough that I'm making a review even though I never make them. Since the last update though, it has become unplayable for me. At first I just wasn't able to see the jobs for each train, and therefore be able to send them out on jobs. So when I saw that there was a resent update I figured that it was a conflict caused by that, so I uninstalled the app and downloaded it again. When I opened it up after that I was nothing but a black screen that wouldn't load farther.

Hope this update FIXES the game. Don't know how they could have released the last one (verion 1.3.7) - LOST ALL MY RAILROADS, only engines, improved yards, & not enough game currency remaind to find out if the game was playable! Looked up the developer's address - in USA - though it would be in some part of the world were they would need vast sums of money or be trying to convert the games to online only. WELL I'LL HAVE TO UPDATE BECAUSE THE ONLY OTHER OPTION IS TO UNINSTALL.

After the latest update, the game is LITERALLY UNPLAYABLE! In fact, I cannot find it in my apps!The cute icon featuring a pixelised steamer engine is nowhere to be seen, send help! Curiously enough, the latest Android update seems to have forced an installation of an app previously unknown to me. Its icon is a white blue train on a white blue background. Man... technology these days...

I found a bug. It wont let me pick up jobs and move my trains to different station because of it. It's just stuck to the station i left my trains to refuel. Too bad been playing this for quite a some time but still restarting my progress coz there's no cloud save. Im expecting to finally finish and complete this game once and for all but then this bug stopped me from playing. Wont play it until update and fixed. Hope that someday Pocket Planes will be back for android. ALL MY LINES ARE STUCK

title: Oil Train Simulator 2019
description:
Welcome to the most entertaining TRAIN SIMULATOR game of the year, with the best MULTIPLAYER feature and exciting MINI GAME train puzzle game. One of the most fine train driving game of this year! City train driving simulations is a new concept with modern day fast track. Train Simulator 2019  will get you addicted to quick track changing, realistic Indian Trains and tremendous train speed to explore.

This is the first in a planned series of high-quality, feature-rich railroad simulation games covering every major destination in the world. It‚Äôs a perfect combination to have fun for both adults & kids who are fond of trains & other adventurous vehicle trips. Pick up the passengers from stations, drive and control your train perfectly with modern and new 3D graphics. The role of a train driver has never been so smooth, keep going and enjoy the gameplay with easy controls. If you are driving your train in the city area, check for trucks, cars, bus and other small and big vehicles. Change the camera view as per your comfort, pick up all the passengers and drop them at their respective destinations. You need to clear all the levels successfully before you call yourself a real train driver. You may face many challenges to get through and complete the tasks, but this game will definitely take you to a whole new level of satisfaction & fun.

Book your tickets for this local train game, get ready for the ultimate train journey through this mobile train game and travel across the country.

title: Conduct THIS! ‚Äì Train Action
description:
Conduct THIS! is an explosive train railway action puzzle game that will challenge your inner conductor!
 
Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls, use your brain to race against time and bring passengers safely to their destination. Command trains, switch tracks and avoid collisions in increasingly challenging action puzzles. 
 
As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards. 
 
‚Ä¢ Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds 
‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches 
‚Ä¢ Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions 
‚Ä¢ Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection 
‚Ä¢ Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit 
‚Ä¢ Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ 
‚Ä¢ Share your most explosive crashes with your friends 
‚Ä¢ Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon K√∂lle
‚Ä¢ Winner of the International Mobile Gaming Awards in the category of Best Quickplay game.

‚ÄúThe low-poly visuals are gorgeous, the music is incredibly well done, and the puzzles themselves are clever and challenging.‚Äù ‚Äì AppAdvice

‚ÄúConduct THIS! is one of the fresh breaths of air and originality that the App Store needs from time to time‚Äù ‚Äì Applesfera

‚ÄúConduct This is a gorgeous-challenging game of skill, what feels like such a Transport Tycoon on Red Bull‚Äù ‚Äì Check App

comments: Downloaded this game and instantly loved it. The controls are easy to understand, and the gameplay is simple. This is a great game to download if you want something that is a bit challenging, but fun at the same time. One thing I would suggest adding, though: an American train. The Amtrak Acella would be a good choice, I think. Anyways, thanks Northplay for making such great games. Keep up the good work.

Suggestion An awesome game. Having fun totally. The only suggestion I would like to give is regarding the color of the passengers/stations. There is a shade of purple and blue which is difficult to recognise for the color blind persons like me. I would request the developers to change the colors to some other dark color which will help us to recognize the colors better. Overall a great time killer

Update: continuous mode is here plus other new features. Here's my 5 stars as promised. :) Great game. I'm going back through at the moment to get 3 stars on every level. Needs a continuous mode, maybe add building difficulty as time progresses. I'll give 5 stars if you can add continuous mode
Owsum levels, tricky and challenging but not impossible, the developers are too good at keeping the ads at, tolerable level, and playable. Kudos to developers team‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Fun game. However, I noticed that while on the first few levels of the game, the online subscription was $2.99. Was happy to consider subscribing, but upon playing a few more levels and assume closer to the end of the game (trial?) the subscription cost increased to $4.99. Hope this was a genuine price change rather than an increase because i was more inclined to purchase being closer to the finish.

title: Train mania
description:
You are a train conductor and its up to you to deliver the loads.
Go for the high score, but be sure not to lose your load along the way.
Do you have what it takes to be the best?

Guide your train and its cargo across a series of well, not-so-smooth tracks. Try not to lose any cargo along the way! 

This game is pure craziness. Control the goods train and deliver as fast as you can important packages to the next station. Drive your train on rails in time, overcome the roller coaster ride and beware of losing anything. Enjoy Train Mania.

In this simple game you become a train driver and you have to load goods and are also responsible for the transport. Do not lose anything and you will be successful. 

Game developed by gametornado.

title: Euro Train Simulator
description:
"Euro Train Simulator is a very well constructed game for Android that puts players in the front seat of the most popular commercial trains around." ‚Äì AndroidAppsReview.com

Euro Train Simulator is a high-quality, feature-rich railroad simulation game covering major destinations in Europe. Featuring richly detailed environment, an intuitive, easy to use, made for mobile interface, the game lets users drive some of the most famous trains in the world.

Spanning several countries and a wide number of cities, the game is one of a kind mobile game.

Play Career Mode to accomplish each scenario and unlock new trains and routes. Career accomplishments are featured on a leader-board. On the other hand, Quick Mode lets you choose the train, route, source and destination stations, weather and the time of the day for the simulation.

Available Countries:

üá©üá™ Germany: The German route connects Munich to Augsburg and passes through stations like Grobenzell, Olching, Mammendorf and Merring. 

üáÆüáπ Italy: The Italian route is the only one that connects two countries and it connects to French capital Paris. The intervening Italian stops are Turin. 

üá´üá∑ France The breathtaking French architecture is on full view in this stunning route connecting Paris (Gare de Lyon) to Milan via Lyon, Chambery and Modane. 
 
üá™üá∏ Spain: The scenic route connecting Barcelona to Madrid is a Real gem. It starts at Madrid Atocha with stops at Calatayud, Zaragoza, Lleida, Tarragonna. The final station is the beautiful Barcelona Sants.


‚ùÑÔ∏è Weather: Clear, Overcast, Fog, Rain and Thunderstorm

üïê Time: 9:00, 12:00, 15:00, 18:00 and 21:00

üö¶ Signal: For ease of understanding, Euro Train Simulator currently uses the UK railway signalling, with Green, Single Yellow and Red lights.

üë¨ People: Animated passengers, from all walks of life, waiting at the station.

üöâ Stations: The stations were designed keeping the authentic modern German railway stations  in mind.The likeness is uncanny.

üöà Types of trains: Euro Train Simulator currently features 10 unique types of trains, ranging from Bombardier trains to super fast inter-city expresses.

üé• Camera angles: multiple, interesting camera angles have been provided: Indoor, Overhead, God's Eye, Reverse, Signal Camera Angle and one customisable angle.


Thank you for your continued support. Suggest features in the comments section and the ones getting most number of responses will be made available very soon. If you have any issue with the game, feel free to write to us and we assure you we will resolve them in an update. You do not have to give us a low rating to get our attention. We are listening!

If you are a fan of the majestic Indian Railways, you must try our flagship Indian Train Simulator. For the people out there who would like to enjoy the scenic paddy fields of Indonesia, we strongly recommend the Indonesian Train Simulator. If you wish to get early access to some of our upcoming features, you can become a Beta Tester and help us improve Euro Train Simulator.

title: Train Simulator 2015 USA FREE
description:
Train Simulator 2015 - United States of America USA and Canada Route - North America Rail Lines its finally free here!

Easy to play! We are happy to announce our newest Train Simulator with the same experience on desktops now in your mobile device! 
You are going to travel though all United States and Canada with the most famous and cool trains on Train Simulator 2015!

Drive Train Simulator 2015 and get on your train to the railroad of United States and Canada to Boston, New York, Kansas City, Las Vegas, San Francisco, Portland, Denver, Chicago, Detroit, Vancouver, Winnipeg and Montreal.

Categories of trains in Train Simulator 2015:
- Vintage/modern steamed trains
- Electric metro/trains
- Bullet trains
- Diesel trains

Those are the Trains included in the Train Simulator:
- LK06 Steam
- LK14 Steam
- LS08 Steam
- TGV Bullet Train
- LT50 Electric
- 181 Diesel
- TE10M Diesel
- VIS31337 Diesel
- 4268 Diesel
- Delorean from-the-movie (yes, this vintage tribute for you to play with!)

MAIN FEATURES: 
- 10 trains
- 12 Stations
- 210 missions 
- Exclusive missions depending on your train. 
- Delorean from-the-movie tribute car/train.
- Functional instruments of a train, throttle, reverse, manual and hydraulic brakes.
- Dynamic instruments and advanced HUD.
- Detailed train stations and wagons. 
- Detailed world scenario, with nature, cities, dynamic sky and ocean
- Living marine and land animals. 

Have the best time in the command of the best trains on Train Simulator! 

Meet the stations on all the Train Simulator included Cities from United States and Canada, the main North American railroad route:
- Boston, Massachusetts‚Äô capital and largest city, founded in 1630, it‚Äôs one of the oldest cities in the U.S. 
- New York, home to the Empire State Building, Times Square, Statue of Liberty and other iconic sites, a fast-paced city, globally influential center of art, culture, fashion and finance.
- Kansas City, the largest city in the state of Missouri. It is the 37th largest city by population in the United States and the 23rd largest by area.
- Las Vegas, in Nevada's Mojave Desert, is a resort town famed for its buzzing energy, 24-hour casinos and endless entertainment options. 
- San Francisco, in northern California, is a city on the tip of a peninsula surrounded by the Pacific Ocean and San Francisco Bay. 
- Portland, the largest city in the U.S. state of Oregon, located near the confluence of the Willamette and Columbia rivers.
- Denver, the capital and most populous municipality of the U.S. state of Colorado, also the most populous county in Colorado.
- Chicago, on Lake Michigan in Illinois, is among the largest cities in the U.S.
- Detroit, the most populous city in the U.S. state of Michigan and the largest city on the United States‚ÄìCanada border.
- Vancouver, a bustling west coast seaport in British Columbia, is among Canada‚Äôs densest, most ethnically diverse cities. 
- Winnipeg, the capital and largest city of the province of Manitoba, Canada. It is located near the longitudinal centre of North America, at the confluence of the Red and Assiniboine Rivers.
- Montreal, the largest city in Qu√©bec. Predominantly French-speaking, it‚Äôs set on an island in the Saint Lawrence River and named after Mt. Royal, the triple-peaked hill at its heart.

Master the controls of your train in a easy, fun and realistic world environment! Don't forget to give us your feedback!

title: Classic Train Simulator
description:
‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ Please rate and review the game. ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Classic Train Sim is the first of its kind high-quality, feature-rich railroad simulation games exclusively dedicated to the golden steam engine era. It features some of the most iconic British and American steam locomotives. Its intuitive, easy to use interface lets users play Career Mode to accomplish varied scenarios and unlock new trains and routes. 

Classic Train Sim is the first mobile train simulator to feature authentic trains from British train operators. The locomotives have been accurately recreated with maximum attention to detail.

‚òÜ Original Steam engines ‚òÜ
Features stations from Britain and trains including the world famous Flying Scotsman.

‚òÜ Authentic British Stations ‚òÜ
London's King's Cross, Peterborough, Doncaster, York and Huntingdon

‚òÜ Permit System ‚òÜ
Access to every feature, train and location in the game is through a dedicated Permit System. Purchase newer permits using the in-game Credits and Gems. 

‚òÜ Career Mode ‚òÜ 
Dedicated career mode with Objectives that are required to be completed for maximum reward. Career accomplishments are featured on a leaderboard.

‚òÜ Functional Driver Cabin ‚òÜ
A detailed Driver Cab Control view shows fully functional levers and switches. The needles and gauges work depending on the condition of the train. 

‚òÜ Weather System ‚òÜ
Hyper-realistic dynamic weather system with incredible night detail and shadow. 

‚òÜ Payloads ‚òÜ
Exclusive payload for various freight compartments. Coal Wagon, Cattle Wagon Etc

‚òÜ Schedule Board ‚òÜ
Schedule for arrival and departure lets users follow a time table like real world. 

‚òÜ Camera Angles ‚òÜ
Many camera angles shows the game from every view imaginable. 

‚òÜ Passenger Area ‚òÜ
Passenger seating area with first class, second class, executive cabin. Also view of restaurant, bar and restroom will be added soon.

‚òÜ Train Controls ‚òÜ
Throttle, braking, cab light and headlights, whistle are available to the driver and are required to be operated for certain objectives in Career Mode.

‚òÜ Door Operation ‚òÜ
Door control system to let the passengers into the train. 

‚òÜ Drive Mode ‚òÜ
A quick mode that lets you choose the train, route, source and destination stations, weather and the time of the day for the simulation.

‚òÜ Multi Language Translations ‚òÜ
- The Game already support English, French, Indonesian and German. More languages like Italian, Spanish, Czech, Portuguese will be added in the future. 

‚òÜ Signal System and AI trains‚òÜ
The Signals system are accurate and keep a large number of AI trains in control without any traffic. Follows the British world-war era semaphore signalling. 

‚òÜ Contacts Permission is required by Google Play Games and is not necessary for playing the game. Feel free to refuse that permission if you do not want Google Play Games leaderboard.  


‚òÜ Hope you enjoy playing Classic Train Sim. Future updates will add more train operators from America and routes as well. More updates are coming soon. 

So what are you waiting for? Become a Train Driver today and drive Steam Locomotives all across Britain. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EuroTrainSim/

title: Easy Train Game
description:
Driver mode makes you feel like a conductor!

If you drag along the screen it will create rails that a train will start to run on. 
If you touch the screen buildings, trees and puddles will appear. 

Touch and drag along the screen and create your own city!
It's also fun to see what happens when the train bumps into buildings, trees and puddles. 

When you press the ‚ÄúDrive‚Äù button it changes to conductor mode where you feel just like you're really there. 
Use the accelerator and the brake to drive the train!!
If you touch up, down, left or right on the screen while driving you will be able to look at the other trains that are running from different angles!!

In camera mode you can follow the trains from many different angles. 
Enjoy checking out your own personal city!!

****How to Play****

Normal Mode
-Create rails by dragging along the screen and a train selection list will appear. (You can also choose auto-select from the menu.)
-the train will start to run once You choose a train.
-If you tap the screen, buildings, trees and puddles will be placed. (Change with the bottom left ‚Äúplacement‚Äù button.)
-Adjust the camera in 4 levels with the ‚ÄúLarger‚Äù and ‚ÄúSmaller‚Äù buttons. 
-If you press the ‚ÄúDrive‚Äù button it will switch into conductor mode. 
-If you press the ‚ÄúCamera‚Äù button it will switch into camera mode. 
-If you press the ‚ÄúTrash‚Äù button it will remove the last railway and train you created.
-Even when there is no train or rails, if you press the ‚ÄúTrash‚Äù button again buildings, trees and puddles will disappear. 

Conductor Mode
-Change the speed with the ‚ÄúBreak‚Äù and ‚ÄúAccelerator‚Äù buttons. 
-If You press up, down, left or right on the screen You can Change the camera angle.
-The ‚ÄùChange Train‚Äù button will change the train to another train. 
-The ‚ÄúLarger‚Äù and ‚ÄúSmaller‚Äù buttons will adjust the camera to 4 different levels. 
-The ‚ÄúReturn‚Äù button returns to normal mode. 

Camera Mode
-Follow the trains from various perspectives.
-the camera will Change If You tap the screen.
-The ‚ÄúChange Train‚Äù button will change the train to another. 
-The ‚ÄúReturn‚Äù button will return you to normal mode.

title: American Diesel Trains: Idle Manager Tycoon
description:
Play the best manager tycoon game.
Today is the day when your grandfather, an experienced Yardmaster, has retired and entrusted his heritage to your care ‚Äì the SWV company in charge of the Bluefield Yard in West Virginia. From now on, you‚Äôll be running a real Rail Yard and working for the benefit of the United States. Work hard and strenuously, and develop the company by taking over other rail yards and buying engines.

If you‚Äôre fascinated with railways and diesel engines, this train games is a perfect choice for you. During the game, you‚Äôll be facing the tasks actual yardmasters and engineers, who travel thousands of miles in legendary switchers and road switchers, need to do every day. This is a great treat for all enthusiasts of railway mock-ups, which allows players to collect various types of engines and expand their railroads.

It‚Äôs a typical idle clicker in the world of miniature train replicas of actual engines that used to be utilized or are still operational in the United States. Each engine has its specific characteristics; they are activated and controlled differently. There's a series of missions ahead of you. Switching operations, transporting freight wagons and passenger cars, etc. You‚Äôll be sitting inside the most famous and legendary engines such as GTEL Big Blows, Centennial DD40X or Baldwin Sharknose RF 16.

Return to the world of your childhood where you used to play with miniature trains on a railway mock-up.

PLEASE NOTE:
American Diesel Trains is free to download and play, however some items in the game may be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable it or set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

Support:
Are you having problems? Contact us at games@kiko.cat

This is a great treat for all enthusiasts of railway mock-ups, which allows players to collect various types of engines and expand their railroads.

It‚Äôs a typical idle clicker in the world of miniature train replicas of actual engines that used to be utilized or are still operational in the United States. Each engine has its specific characteristics; they are activated and controlled differently. There's a series of missions ahead of you. Switching operations, transporting freight wagons and passenger cars, etc. You‚Äôll be sitting inside the most famous and legendary engines such as GTEL Big Blows, Centennial DD40X or Baldwin Sharknose RF 16.

Return to the world of your childhood where you used to play with miniature trains on a railway mock-up.

PLEASE NOTE:
American Diesel Trains is free to download and play, however some items in the game may be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable it or set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

Support:
Are you having problems? Contact us at games@kiko.cat

comments: I have a problem with this game. It will not let me get any game by I'm betting it's probably going to be a one-star anyways for me because I am a big train Game Fan I played a lot of train games. So we have a problem with this game. So this game needs to be updated. And you need to fix that problem immediately. Or I'll delete my review and delete the one star that I pushed out to your game.

You really need to fix it so the trains run ON the tracks! Overall I like the concept of the game. Also when coming to a stop you should be able to stop AT the red line. Please address these issues with your next update. Thank you.
The game is awesome. There are many upgrades for your yard. The only thing like is that there aren't many train horns but thats okay.

Simple but appealing train game. Chicago Train is the next evolution but by no means renders American Diesel Trains obsolete. Not a money grab either. Had to knock off a star for the annoying bug where the wrong map pops up, wiping out previous train orders. Also, the contracts - can't see how you finish one without playing 24 hours straight. Game does get repetitive: buy new yard, expand, buy another, etc.

Honestly, i was beginning to like this game, the grinding wasnt to bad, but then i use the coin booster i get up to around 31,000 coins, feeling goos, and then next screen im at 20,000 coins...im pissed, im not going to grind or play only to have my money taken away for no reasonb im uninstalling and im pretty pissed.

title: DeckEleven's Railroads
description:
DeckEleven's Railroads is an addictive railroad empire building game in full 3D.

You are in charge of building your own railroad empire, from track layout to cargo management. Choose your train configuration wisely, from steam-powered locomotives to modern diesel and electric engines. From India to USA, From Canada to France, your empire will grow worldwide .

The train is leaving the station now! Are you ready?

recentChanges:

Save hats level in case of crash
Fix Australia objectives
Fix UI for tablets
comments: Had to start from scratch so many times! Ridiculous! If you don't lay out EVERYTHING PERFECTLY the first time, after you set your train to start running, you'll have to start the challenge over! So if you see something that is wrong or can be tweaked to be more efficient, you can't change track layout (nothing major, just a tweek!) or change order of stops! It's super evident once you get to Barcelona. Stop lights are a joke. Loading track at each destination is a joke. Common sense people!

Fun puzzles, and decent graphics for a handheld. You can lay down track where you want, which puts this above most other mobile train games. But...no Freeplay/sandbox, and you can't keep playing a map after meeting the objectives. Thus, after playing through the 20 or so maps (45 minutes each?), you're done. Can go back and replay, but that's it. Add sandbox, and it would be a 5-star. Fun while it lasts, but not much replayability.

This game is great! It plays very much like "Sid Meyers Railroads!" with the exception that you play against a list of objectives rather than AI players. The controls have been streamlined for mobile very well and there are tons of levels to play through.

Good, well developed game. Has some pay to win elements though. Its pretty much impossible without using hats. You get hats for completing missions or you can buy them with real cash. You will probably want to grind the Japan mission for Hats to the point where it's no longer fun. For improvement please allow refunds when selling trains and buying a locomotive and then canceling it, this includes Hats. Thanks. Update...Not worth it. To much pay to win or grind previous missions for hats.

Going to be honest here. I paid the $$$ requested for some in-game currency... I just wanted to be able to get one or two needed trains. I never thought the game was pay per play. As you progress, it becomes obvious that you cant complete the tasks without using real $$$. It defeats the purpose of the game. So yes, I am giving one star.

title: Gold Train FRVR - Best Railroad Connection Game
description:
Solve challenging and unique puzzles, by connecting railroads and building a safe way to make the railway reach the train station. Improve the locomotive and add wagons (for goods or passengers) and vaults to get as much gold as you can in your way over the rails. Do it as fast as you can or the train will crash! This plumber style game mixes the western aesthetic of the old trains transporting gold with the flow puzzles. The best pipe connecting game to keep your brain sharpen!

Play Gold Train FRVR now if you‚Äôre a jigsaw lover. Easy to play but challenging and engaging, the best option for both kids and adults!

üöâüí∞üí∞ üöÇüöÉüöÉüöÉüöÉüí® üí∞üí∞üöâ

A new railroad puzzle game! Gold Train FRVR is your new favorite railway line game! Addictive and fun gameplay that will hook you up for hours! Drag, drop and rotate track tiles to complete the lines for the train and try to reach the next station! Evolve and improve your train and get as much gold as you can on your way to the station to reach the higher score among your friends! Each scenario is a new challenge, how many gold coins can you get?

Gold Train FRVR is a truly relaxing railroad puzzle game where there‚Äôs NO LIVES MODE. Play as much as you want! Moves are not limited, if none of the pieces fit on the board, just press the shuffle button and new railway tracks will appear. Squeeze your brain with hours of pipe connecting and drag the train tracks wisely! Be careful and select the right tile to assemble the railway road and get the train to the station safe! Can you become the railroad tycoon of the wild west?

Try to solve the puzzles using all the railroad tracks to maximize your score, and reach the train station before the time runs out to get a bonus. You have two options in each stage: solve the puzzle as fast as you can to multiply your gold earnings or relax and play at your own pace since there is no time limit. Sharpen your wits to solve the challenges of each puzzle with the best brain training game. Connect the railroad tracks and save the trains!

Relaxing gameplay that mix pipeline games and classic puzzle with a fresh railroad-theme where all the pieces can be swapped and shuffled to connect the railway tracks. The railroad tracks need to be connected before you can continue, otherwise the train will crash and you‚Äôll lost all the gold! All that you need is correctly connecting the pipes from one point to another. Don‚Äôt be afraid of getting stuck, since you can always change, shuffle and switch the pieces as many times as you need to solve the railway puzzle.

Drive a railroad through hundreds of wild west levels. Build the train tracks from the starting point to the destination train station, and try to fill all the blanks with the railway pieces. Cross the rivers using wooden bridges or build rail crossings to go through the same site several times. Try to pass by the mine to fill the vaults with gold coins, then use the money to improve and upgrade the parts of the railroad: locomotive to add multipliers to your score, wagons for transporting both goods and passengers, and vaults to fill with gold coins.

Gold Train FRVR is a low storage game, you don‚Äôt need more than 40 mb to play! This railroad connection game only focuses on giving you a truly fun experience in a low mb game for free. It‚Äôs an easy to play pipe connecting game with incredibly addictive and simple controls, so both young and adults can have fun. Play online or offline, since you don‚Äôt need an internet connection to play this railway puzzle game. And relax, you can play as much as you want, there‚Äôs no time limit!

title: Train shunting puzzle
description:
Train shunting puzzle - is a new game, which would be interesting for railroad and puzzles fans.

Control one or multiple locomotives, change tracks with railroad switches, couple wagons and cars to reach the platforms and complete the level. It is easy at first levels, but much harder afterwards. Try to get three stars for each level!

Features:
- different game modes: campaigns - levels from easy to hard, Inglenook sidings and Timesaver modes
- tutorial at first levels
- beautiful graphics
- user-friendly controls
- different level locations: industrial zones, nature, city
- automatic wagons coupling
- records sharing through Google Play

comments: Nice little free game. My experience of the adds, I got, was that they weren't too intrusive, and relatively short. The puzzles were challenging to get three stars on all levels, but still enjoyable when only scoring one star.
Very good, but there are too few campaign levels and I'm not particularly interested in time trials, so the replayability is a little low for me. But it was exactly what I wanted to play!

This is a great game but it could be even better if each level had the number of moves to reach 3 stars and that number reduces with each move. It's difficult to know how many moves to qualify for 3 stars. Edit: Level 17 I cannot figure out how to complete it in less than 14 moves. I got 3 stars on all other levels but 17.
Fun little game.. just wish there were more levels! Steam chuff from a diesel was a little odd.
A fun little game. I only wish that there were more puzzles!

title: Chicago Train - Idle Transport Tycoon
description:
Chicago Train is a story about the railways in Chicago. Created by railway enthusiasts, it gives all train fans the opportunity to fulfil their greatest dreams. In this Tycoon, you‚Äôll be collecting legendary engines, carrying passengers in the centre of Chicago, and setting up long-distance express trains to the farthest corners of the United States. 

Have you heard of the largest railroad line METRA? Of course, you have. It‚Äôs a real treat for fans of the railway in Chicago. You‚Äôll be able to manage it in our game! Powerful diesel engines, high-voltage power lines, power plants waiting for coal and foreheads of engine drivers covered in sweat are the essence of Chicago Train.

Manage your transport tasks cautiously, count raw materials and collect engines to become the most important player in Chicago.

comments: Pretty good game slow to start but not to hard, not to easy. Over all, its a pleasant game. People there is nice and friendly, support is awesome if you have questions or concerns they are there on top of things. Id recommend this game. Mini game controls are to small the joy stick and fire button. Over all great game.

I enjoy the game . I like how it is realistic and fun. I think it is neat how the game map uses Google maps which makes it a more realistic game. Only thing is when you pay for no ads their is still ads in the game. Also think it would be nice to be able to speed the ships up like you do with the trains otherwise a great game to pass the time with.

Theres lots of features in this game that unlock at certain levels, would be great to no these exist when you first play the game. Really addictive and would recommend. Very enjoyable so far. Easy to work out and advances enough so you don't get bored. I like the jobs are on a real map. I will be playing it for some time yet I hope. Kinda addicted!

title: Happy trains! for Young kids
description:
‚óá‚óÜNew train was included‚óÜ‚óá

‚óÜ‚óáWin No.1  ranking of Education category in Google play ‚óá‚óÜ


When you touch the screen with the sense of drawing, tracks will be created and train starts moving on it. A fantastic education application for kids (~6 years old) 
Just by touching, your children can enjoy unique sound effects and movements, which help develop their sense perception.

Actions like ‚Äútap‚Äù (touch), ‚Äúdrag‚Äù (trace) are easy to do, so your children can enjoy the app without any difficulties.
Up to more than 10 kinds of running trains, so you can enjoy the games without getting bored.

Use virtual money called "Points" to increase number of trains.

‚óèHow to earn Points
„ÉªAfter choosing "Get points", you will be taken to a page that advertising company established.
„ÉªAfter finishing all steps on your current device until the conditions for getting Points are satisfied, you will get your Points.
„ÉªIf you change the devices that you are using, the data will not be transferred. Please note that.
„ÉªIf you install app, you can get Points for the first time the app starts.
ÔºäThis is not applicable to users who already installed app.
„ÉªYou cannot convert Points to money or similar.

‚óèHow to use Points (Ways to change trains)
„ÉªTap the train that you want on the "Change trains" screen.
„ÉªIf Points are enough, trains will be altered.
„ÉªIf points are not enough, gain points and choose it again.

‚óèDisplay settings of trains
„ÉªYou can choose the train that you want it to run in display setting.
„ÉªTap button in display setting and turn it ON to activate the train that you want.
„ÉªTurn it OFF to deactivate the train.
„ÉªTap to switch ON/OFF display.


* To make sure that your children will not accidentally close the game, BACK button cannot be used to leave the play screen in this app.


///// How to play /////
"„ÉªTAP or DRAG to draw lines.
When a line reaches a certain length or you draw and wait for a while, tracks will appear and train will run."
„ÉªYou can change background from menu screen.
„ÉªYou can erase the tracks all at once by SHAKING your devices.


‚ÄªFollow Twitter account @Atech_apps to update information about Atech apps. 

Please confirm the terms of service before using. If you download this application, it is understood that you agreed with the terms of service.

When you touch the screen with the sense of drawing, tracks will be created and train starts moving on it. A fantastic education application for kids (~6 years old)
Just by touching, your children can enjoy unique sound effects and movements, which help develop their sense perception.

Actions like ‚Äútap‚Äù (touch), ‚Äúdrag‚Äù (trace) are easy to do, so your children can enjoy the app without any difficulties.
Up to more than 10 kinds of running trains, so you can enjoy the games without getting bored.

Use virtual money called "Points" to increase number of trains.

‚óèHow to earn Points
„ÉªAfter choosing "Get points", you will be taken to a page that advertising company established.
„ÉªAfter finishing all steps on your current device until the conditions for getting Points are satisfied, you will get your Points.
„ÉªIf you change the devices that you are using, the data will not be transferred. Please note that.
„ÉªIf you install app, you can get Points for the first time the app starts.
ÔºäThis is not applicable to users who already installed app.
„ÉªYou cannot convert Points to money or similar.

‚óèHow to use Points (Ways to change trains)
„ÉªTap the train that you want on the "Change trains" screen.
„ÉªIf Points are enough, trains will be altered.
„ÉªIf points are not enough, gain points and choose it again.

‚óèDisplay settings of trains
„ÉªYou can choose the train that you want it to run in display setting.
„ÉªTap button in display setting and turn it ON to activate the train that you want.
„ÉªTurn it OFF to deactivate the train.
„ÉªTap to switch ON/OFF display.


* To make sure that your children will not accidentally close the game, BACK button cannot be used to leave the play screen in this app.


///// How to play /////
"„ÉªTAP or DRAG to draw lines.
When a line reaches a certain length or you draw and wait for a while, tracks will appear and train will run."
„ÉªYou can change background from menu screen.
„ÉªYou can erase the tracks all at once by SHAKING your devices.


‚ÄªFollow Twitter account @Atech_apps to update information about Atech apps.

Please confirm the terms of service before using. If you download this application, it is understood that you agreed with the terms of service.

title: Metro-North Train Time
description:
The Official Metro-North app includes real-time train status and track information, links to MTA eTix to buy electronic tickets, trip schedules and fares, and detailed station information including Grand Central.

Features include:
- Link to the MTA eTix app to buy electronic tickets from trip searches 
- Access real-time trip information directly from Metro-North including train status, track number, and the latest service notices
- Save favorite trips for one click access to daily schedules, status and track number
- Get schedules that update in real-time ‚Äî no need to download new timetables every time you open the app! 
- Find out trip details including duration, transfer details, Peak / Off Peak, fares and station stops
- Browse the new ‚ÄúDiscover Grand Central‚Äù page to see the latest deals from Grand Central shops and restaurants, check out upcoming events, and explore the directory map
- Look up station information including location, parking, taxis and connecting services
- Find Grand Central Terminal information, including deals, events, and directories
- Easy access to accessibility details including ADA compliance and elevator / escalator status for all stations

Whether you are a daily commuter looking for up-to-date information on your usual trip or an occasional traveler trying to find the best trip option, the Train Time App is the most convenient and accurate way to plan a seamless trip.

summary: The Official Metro-North app including real-time train status and track info.
recentChanges: Added ETA details and link to myMNR
comments: It has the minimum required functionality (you can look up times and save common trips), but no attempt has since been made to patch obvious deficiencies: the train-tracking is just a link to a website, you can't adjust the time of saved trips (so if you want to look at times tomorrow, you need to search for your stations again), and, most annoyingly, you can't see times for departed trains -- meaning that you can't check the ETA of the train you're currently on.
easy to use. quick and convenient. Combines train times as well as the ability to by tickets.
Very buggy and could be made into something a lot more functional and cohesive. All the apps really need to be combined into one.

My dad recommended this to me because I would take the train to see him or just travel in general. I usually travel to Poughkeepsie or Manhattan when I take the Metro North. When I first used this app, I wasn't sure how it worked. Overtime, I learned how it worked and it quickly became useful and convenient for me. Would recommend this app to anyone who takes the Metro North.
Can't even see the past train time, even the one that was 5 mins ago. Cant't even go back and search for train, always have to search the "Favorite" , no real time delay. 1 star

title: LEGO¬Æ DUPLO¬Æ Connected Train
description:
"This app may be used with or without the LEGO¬Æ DUPLO¬Æ Cargo Train (10875) or LEGO DUPLO Steam Train (10874).
 
CREATE AND CONNECT 
 
All aboard the DUPLO train! Join the train driver in an exciting adventure on the DUPLO railway. Help the driver by controlling the train‚Äôs speed, turning on the headlights, sounding the horn and more!
 
As part of a brand new experience, your child can collect more than 20 different stickers and place them in the inspirational DUPLO train landscape. In this experience we also have fresh, intuitive controls, including a new color-changing light button.
 
With the train sets you can place DUPLO action bricks on the rails to make the driver react to your actions. Each action brick can also launch an exciting activity to add even more fun and inspire play with your physical train set.
 
You can also play without the physical trains and will be able to join the driver on fun activities, collect stickers and have the app react to your actions.
 
Come with us on a joyful ride and enjoy great fun with LEGO DUPLO Connected Train. 
 
FEATURES 
Intuitive and easy interface for children to navigate and control the physical and digital train
Fun toddler-friendly visuals and interactions
Trigger events in the app with the physical action bricks
Help the driver go on adventures, and complete age-appropriate activities
Easy connection instructions ‚Äì open the app, choose your train in the main menu, turn on the physical train and the connection will happen automatically
No in-app purchase 
No third-party advertising 
No third-party data tracking 
Parental gate to access information about LEGO DUPLO and further information about the app"

Why play with LEGO DUPLO?
LEGO DUPLO aims to be your Partner in Play when it comes to your child‚Äôs growth and development from age 1 1/2. We work with child development experts, educators, and parents to ensure that all LEGO DUPLO products ‚Äì both in real life and in games like this ‚Äì deliver value, safety, versatility, and an outlet for creative thinking that will set the stage for a love of learning and play that will last a lifetime. Thank you for allowing us to be part of your child‚Äôs journey!

For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. 
For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactus 

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.

title: Euro Train Simulator 2
description:
"If you enjoy realistic simulations, and of course all things locomotives, Euro Train Sim 2 is a game that you simply can‚Äôt pass up." ‚Äì AndroidAppsReview.com

Euro Train Sim 2 is the first mobile train simulator to feature officially-licensed real trains from Germantrain operator Deutsche Bahn. The locomotives have been authentically recreated with maximum attention to detail. Euro Train Sim 2 is a high-quality, feature-rich railroad simulation games covering every major destination in the world. Featuring an intuitive, easy to use interface, the game lets users play Career Mode to accomplish varied scenarios and unlock new trains and routes. 

‚òÜ Official DB trains ‚òÜ
Features stations from Germany and France and official DB licensed trains including the world famous ICE3, DB142 and a range of freight trains.

‚òÜ Germany ‚òÜ
Munich, Merring, Augsburg, Grobenzell, Olching, Ulm, Stuttgart, Karlsruhe 

‚òÜ France ‚òÜ
Strasbourg, Paris, Lille, Coquelles

‚òÜ Train Academy ‚òÜ
Become an expert at driving trains in Euro Train Sim 2 by graduating from our Train Academy. Features 10 hand-crafted levels to take you through all major aspects of the game.

‚òÜ Achievements ‚òÜ
The more you play, the more Achievements you can unlock. Earn Gold and Gems .

‚òÜ Daily Rewards ‚òÜ
Amazing achievements which you can complete every day. Complete them all and earn lots of Gold and Gems.

‚òÜ Career ‚òÜ
Complete all of our specially crafted  8 Exciting Chapters in the career mode and unlock Achievements and Daily Rewards. 

‚òÜ Engine Builder ‚òÜ
First time ever! Assemble a special engine with our Engine Builder and you get it drive it in Custom Mode. Use Gold to buy train parts.

‚òÜ Functional Driver Cabin ‚òÜ
A detailed Driver Cab Control view shows fully functional levers and switches. The needles and gauges work depending on the condition of the train. 

‚òÜ Weather System ‚òÜ
Hyper-realistic dynamic weather system with incredible night detail and shadow. 

‚òÜ Payloads ‚òÜ
Exclusive payload for various freight compartments. Car transporter, Coal Wagon, Oil tankers. Etc

‚òÜ Schedule Board ‚òÜ
Schedule for arrival and departure lets users follow a time table like real world. 

‚òÜ Camera Angles ‚òÜ
22 camera angles shows the game from every view imaginable. 

‚òÜ Passenger Area ‚òÜ
Passenger seating area with first class, second class, execute cabin. Also view of restaurant, bar and restroom. 

‚òÜ Train Controls ‚òÜ
Throttle, braking, realistic wiper, cab light and headlights, horn and pantograph are available to the driver and are required to be operated for certain objectives in Career Mode.

‚òÜ Signal System and AI trains ‚òÜ
The Signals system are accurate and keep a large number of AI trains in control without any traffic. 

Thank you for your continued support. Suggest features in the comments section and the ones getting most number of responses will be made available very soon. If you have any issue with the game, feel free to write to us and we assure you we will resolve them in an update. We are listening!

For the people out there who would like to enjoy the scenic paddy fields of Indonesia, we strongly recommend the Indonesian Train Simulator. For those who would like to enjoy a simpler gameplay,  we can't recommend the Euro Train Simulator enough.

Hope you enjoy playing Euro Train Simulator 2. Future updates will add more train operators and routes from UK, Belgium, Spain and Italy. More updates are coming soon. 

So what are you waiting for? Become a Train Driver today and drive all across Europe.

comments: The game itself has no actual scenarios (like red lights or derailment or coupling with other trains etc.). title: Touch Train 3D
description:
A local train and a limited express begin to run by easy operation!
If a screen is traced, a track can be drawn and a train will begin to run it!

It is the new feeling which is run to the traced portion! 

If a right-hand side train mark button is pushed after running a train, it will change to train viewpoint mode. It is dynamic! 

There are a lot of various mechanisms! 

The train may be added while playing?
Please play every day! 

********** How to play **********

- If a screen is traced, a track can be drawn and a train will begin to run it. 
- The button of the train mark of the screen right is in train viewpoint mode. A viewpoint comes to follow a train. 
- It can stop by pushing purple x button to stop train viewpoint mode. 
- A viewpoint is changeable if a screen is traced at the time of train viewpoint mode. The train which is running can be seen from various angles. 
- Please push the arrow button in the upper and lower sides of x button to change a viewpoint to the train which is different when two or more trains are run. 
- Trash button at the upper left of a screen can erase the track drawn once. 
- The Button in the upper right corner of the screen is a menu button. I can display items on the menus.

descriptionHTML:
